Articles.Content: Ok, I tried to use an early version of ksp (.90.0.705) and I got the parts to connect but no nuclear bombs came out. Is there something else I'm doing wrong?

Ok, I tried to use an early version of ksp (.90.0.705) and I got the parts to connect but no nuclear bombs came out. Is there something else I'm doing wrong?

Did you use the .90 hotfix?

Did you use the .90 hotfix?

What hotfix?

What hotfix?

The one posted earlier in this thread.

The one posted earlier in this thread.

Oh, that one. I tried installing But, i don't know if I did correctly. I installed it by dropping the files into the game data folder.

Oh, that one. I tried installing But, i don't know if I did correctly. I installed it by dropping the files into the game data folder.

Some of the hotfix files replace existing files. If you're not asked/warned about that, they're going in the wrong spot. It very much did work in 0.90. Just coding issues between releases broking it in 1.0.
Is this compatable with ksp 1.0.2?

Some of the hotfix files replace existing files. If you're not asked/warned about that, they're going in the wrong spot. It very much did work in 0.90. Just coding issues between releases broking it in 1.0.

How are you supposed to install the hotfix then? I obviously didn't install it correctly.

How are you supposed to install the hotfix then? I obviously didn't install it correctly.

Unpack so that the new DLL files live in %KSP%/GameData/Nyrath/

Unpack so that the new DLL files live in %KSP%/GameData/Nyrath/

I can't find that folder.

I can't find that folder.

...That's the mod.

...That's the mod.

Ok I tried I found that folder and tried installing it their, but still, nothing changed.

Ok I tried I found that folder and tried installing it their, but still, nothing changed.

So, install the base mod at the beginning of the thread first, then copy the .90 fix over to it and override the original files.

So, install the base mod at the beginning of the thread first, then copy the .90 fix over to it and override the original files.

Ok I finally got it to work. Thank you for helping me.
is this abandoned?

is this abandoned?

I doubt it, it's just that our mod maker is very busy.

Does someone have the correct installation order/technique to get the orion working in 1.0? if so could you explain your method in detail? I have installed this mod and updates many ways and have yet ot get the system to actually launch a propulsion bomb

The Atomic Rockets website is amazing. Every year or so I go there and lose all productivity for a day or two.

It would be interesting to see this mod updated for the new heat mechanics. I expect nuking yourself repeatedly ought to warm you up a bit and require a radiator or two. (Or, y'know, just have an onboard iceberg like the Archangel Michael.)

Since Kopernicus now supports multiple star systems I'm examining my interstellar drive options. Warp drives are for Trekkies, so it's a choice between this and a fusion drive from KSP-Interstellar.
Wait, is the mod still being developed? As in, not abandoned???

Does someone have the correct installation order/technique to get the orion working in 1.0? if so could you explain your method in detail? I have installed this mod and updates many ways and have yet ot get the system to actually launch a propulsion bomb

The mod doesn't yet work in 1.0. No amount of changing the order will help. The core module is non functional until it's updated.

- - - Updated - - -

The Atomic Rockets website is amazing. Every year or so I go there and lose all productivity for a day or two.

It would be interesting to see this mod updated for the new heat mechanics. I expect nuking yourself repeatedly ought to warm you up a bit and require a radiator or two. (Or, y'know, just have an onboard iceberg like the Archangel Michael.)

Since Kopernicus now supports multiple star systems I'm examining my interstellar drive options. Warp drives are for Trekkies, so it's a choice between this and a fusion drive from KSP-Interstellar.

Nyrath aka Winchell Chung has plenty things to keep busy with and just doesn't have this working yet.

Warp drives are for Trekkies

Damn straight
is there a compaibility patch for 1.0.4? does the 0.90 patch work with 1.0.4 or there is no way to use it with 1.0.4.

is there a compaibility patch for 1.0.4? does the 0.90 patch work with 1.0.4 or there is no way to use it with 1.0.4.

I would like to know this as well
Your best bet would be to try it and failing that try reversing any bottom connection nodes.

Your best bet would be to try it and failing that try reversing any bottom connection nodes.

Yep. The stack nodes need the vector rearranged for v1.0+. That means you'll be able to stack the parts, but the module to make pulsed drives work, doesn't. You can still check to see if your boosters can loft an Orion into orbit, but the Orion won't work just yet.
